actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction with respect to the exhaustion of geothermal steam and geothermal resources.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a deduction an amount equal to 25 percent of the gross income from geothermal steam and geothermal resources property. Limits such deduction to a maximum of 50 percent of the taxpayer's taxable income from the geothermal steam and geothermal resources property for the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction with respect to the exhaustion of geothermal steam and geothermal resources.
